actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to abolish the existing procedure for increasing the salaries of certain legislative, executive, and judicial salaries.

summary.text: Abolishes the Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries, which recommends salary levels for positions in the Executive, Legislative, and Judicial branches. (Amends 2 U.S.C. 352-361)

titles.title: A bill to abolish the existing procedure for increasing the salaries of certain legislative, executive, and judicial salaries.
